message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Would you consider this price?
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective.  While I had a higher price in mind, I'm willing to come down to $130. I believe this is a fair offer considering the value you'll be getting.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to adjust your price. However, based on my budget, I can only consider an offer at $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
